csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <!-- locale>
    <term name="number">nummie</term>
  </locale -->
  <macro name="author">
    <names variable="author">
      <name form="short" />
      <label form="long" prefix=", "/>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <text macro="author" />
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
